entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:23 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 07:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
